name: Tales of Dragons & Cavemen
overview: A single screen platformer. You are equipped with a grappling hook and a flashlight, you can climb from one platform to another by shooting the grappling hook diagonally and then climbing across the rope (shoot by holding down fire). You have to avoid cavemen and dragons, some of which can be scared temporarily by your flashlight (also joystick button). Gather all the treasures and make it to the top level to start a new screen.
